fun.connor.lighter.autoconfig

Class AutoConfigFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.lighter.autoconfig.AutoConfigFactory

  • public class AutoConfigFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton Factory for loading compile-time generated auto configuration objects. The methods on this class return instances of the auto generated endpoint configuration as well as an injectable container object for special dependency management needs. The most common use of this class is for loading RouteConfiguration at startup.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static AutoConfigFactory getInstance()
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of the factory

      • loadRouteConfiguration

        public RouteConfiguration loadRouteConfiguration()
        Loads the compile-time generated endpoint configuration for the application. This operation requires reflection. In the event of any error, a AutoConfigException is thrown.
        Returns:
        The route configuration that lighter-compiler generated for this application

      • loadReverseInjector

        public ReverseInjector loadReverseInjector()
        Loads the compile-time generated ReverseInjector for the application. This operation requires reflection. In the event of any error, a AutoConfigException is thrown. See ReverseInjector documentation for an explanation of why one might use this method.
        Returns:
        An instance of an appropriate ReverseInjector implementation for this application.

      • loadAutomaticConfiguration

        public static RouteConfiguration loadAutomaticConfiguration()
        Helper method that directly returns the compile time generated RouteConfiguration for this application. Since most applications do not need to use the other features of this factory, this method can be used to improve code readability. See loadRouteConfiguration()
        Returns:
        The route configuration that lighter-compiler generated for this application
